items.title: Google launches Gemini 3 Flash, makes it the default model in the Gemini app
items.description: Google is making Gemini 3 Flash the default model in the Gemini app and oAI model for Search

items.title: Coursera and Udemy enter a merger agreement valued at around $2.5B
items.description: Coursera and Udemy, two of the biggest names in online learning, are combining platforms next year.

items.title: Bluesky launches a privacy-focused ‘find friends’ feature without invite spam
items.description: The Bluesky contact matching feature is opt-in and your data won't be used to spam your friends, the social network says.

items.title: Warner Bros. Discovery rejects Paramount’s hostile bid, calls offer ‘illusory’
items.description: Warner Bros. Discovery called Paramount's offer "illusory" and said that the company had misled shareholders about its financing.

items.title: Mozilla’s new CEO says AI is coming to Firefox, but will remain a choice
items.description: Mozilla has appointed Anthony Enzor-DeMeo as its CEO, as the Firefox developer scrambles to adapt in a rapidly changing browser market.
